item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文中提到一名被控杀害 22 岁护理专业学生拉肯-莱利（Laken Riley）的无证移民时使用了 "非法 "一词，这让一些民主党人和移民活动家感到失望。
item.description:
Pres. Biden disappointed some Democrats and immigration activists when he used the term "illegal" at the State of the Union when referring to an undocumented migrant accused of killing 22-year-old nursing student Laken Riley. https://t.co/M6dMeZHNB0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 周日晚在洛杉矶举行的第 96 届奥斯卡金像奖颁奖典礼上，好莱坞的一些巨星将获得殊荣：
item.description:
Some of the biggest names in Hollywood will be honored at the 96th Academy Awards in Los Angeles on Sunday night.

Here's what you need to know ahead of the star-studded awards show: https://t.co/bQxNaigCA2 pic.twitter.com/CtYnZctEBY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 众议院立法者将于下周就一项可能在美国禁用 TikTok 的法案进行投票。@jayobtv 提供了更多关于该法案的信息，该法案将 "迫使 TikTok 从其中国母公司手中出售"。#就在此地就在此刻
item.description:
House lawmakers will vote on a bill next week that could ban TikTok in the U.S.@jayobtv has more on the legislation that would "force a sale of TikTok from its Chinese parent company." #RightHereRightNow pic.twitter.com/fUZwvo3BX8

— ABC News Live (@ABCNewsLive) March 8, 2024

item.title: 布里塔妮-德雷克塞尔 2009 年的失踪让她的家人惶恐不安了 13 年，也让全国人民陷入了悬念之中，因为调查人员一直在苦苦寻找这名高中女生。
item.description:
Brittanee Drexel's 2009 disappearance kept her family on edge for 13 years and kept the nation in suspense as investigators searched long and hard for the high school junior.

A new @ABC2020 episode looks at how investigators cracked the case. https://t.co/7DlByaBInM

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 当日全食把白天变成黑夜时，动物的行为会有所不同吗？研究人员将于 4 月 8 日在得克萨斯州的沃斯堡动物园回答这个问题。
item.description:
When a total solar eclipse transforms day into night, do animals act differently?

Researchers will be standing by on April 8 to answer that very question at the Fort Worth Zoo in Texas. https://t.co/OwQquCCG5k pic.twitter.com/sRaTZ6ZmK5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 报告强调了几起事件，其中有人说出了真实的机密项目，但 "受访者错误地将这些真实的美国政府项目与外星人和外星活动联系起来"。
item.description:
The report highlights several incidents where individuals named authentic classified programs but "the interviewees mistakenly associated these authentic USG programs with alien and extraterrestrial activity." pic.twitter.com/wpBCMERpTF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文中赞扬了美国的经济表现--但在提出在改善中产阶级前景的同时提高富人和公司税率的愿景时，他的语气仍然充满挑衅。
item.description:
Pres. Biden touted U.S. economic performance in his State of the Union Address — but still struck a defiant tone when setting forth a vision focused on hiking taxes for wealthy individuals and corporations while improving prospects for the middle class. https://t.co/OnDKPA2Ayq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统将前往战场宾夕法尼亚州，借助国情咨文的势头，拉开他竞选连任的序幕。
item.description:
Pres. Biden is heading to battleground Pennsylvania to build off his momentum from the State of the Union, kicking off a major ramp-up in his reelection campaign. https://t.co/yXu9NjRpZm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 共和党全国委员会主席罗娜-麦克丹尼尔（Ronna McDaniel）在休斯敦最后一次主持了党内会议，就在她辞去这一职务前不久--这为就唐纳德-特朗普批准的新领导层名单进行投票扫清了道路。
item.description:
Republican National Committee Chairwoman Ronna McDaniel gaveled in the party's meeting for the final time in Houston, shortly before she resigned from the role — clearing a path for a vote on the new, Donald Trump-approved slate of leadership. https://t.co/bXdfBhRlAl

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 一名法官无限期推迟了州法院对四名被控在泰尔-尼科尔斯（Tyre Nichols）致命殴打案中犯有二级谋杀罪的前孟菲斯警官的审判，直到联邦法院对其侵犯公民权利的审判结束。
item.description:
A judge has indefinitely postponed the state court trial of four former Memphis officers charged with second-degree murder in the fatal beating of Tyre Nichols until after the conclusion of a federal court trial on civil rights violations. https://t.co/NiYROTJICf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 芝加哥卫生官员确认了该市自 2019 年以来的首例麻疹病例，而全美的感染人数也在不断上升。
item.description:
Chicago health officials have confirmed the city's first measles cases since 2019 amid a rising number of infections across the U.S. https://t.co/QwRqtbEL1Z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 12月被驱逐出国会的前众议员乔治-桑托斯（George Santos）已宣布将再次竞选众议员，但他所关注选区的共和党领导层表示对他 "没有兴趣"。
item.description:
Embattled former Rep. George Santos, who was expelled from Congress in December, has announced that he's once again running for the House — but GOP leadership in the district he's eyeing say there is "no appetite" for him. https://t.co/rsZDPvjA2p

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 新消息：哈马斯管理的加沙卫生部称，周五在加沙地带有五名儿童据称被来自一个不明身份的外国的人道主义援助空投炸死。

NEW: Five children were allegedly killed in the Gaza Strip by a humanitarian aid airdrop from an unidentified foreign country on Friday, the Hamas-run Gaza Ministry of Health said. https://t.co/Cf8PNJEijB pic.twitter.com/RelZ011XmS

item.title: 詹姆斯-克拉布里（James Crumbley）过失杀人案的庭审继续进行，证人出庭作证，指控他在牛津高中枪击案发生前几天的活动，包括购买他儿子后来在枪击案中使用的枪支。
item.description:
James Crumbley's manslaughter trial continued with witnesses taking the stand testifying about his alleged activity in the days leading up to the Oxford High School shooting, including purchasing the firearm that his son later used in the shooting. https://t.co/yUu0OAznEt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 这座占地 200 多英亩的庄园最近在社交媒体上走红，激发了全国游客前往东北部旅游的热情。
item.description:
The more than 200-acre property has recently gone viral on social media, inspiring tourists nationwide to travel northeast. pic.twitter.com/0VrZlAf2e0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 不，这不是梦。这里是金狗农场（Golden Dog Farm），一个位于佛蒙特州绿山的金毛猎犬农场，游客可以在这里与新的毛茸茸的朋友玩耍嬉戏。更多关于如何计划参观的信息：
item.description:
No, this isn't a dream. But, it may feel like one.

It's Golden Dog Farm, a golden retriever farm located in Vermont's Green Mountains, where visitors can play and frolic with their new furry friends.

More on how to plan your visit: https://t.co/f3EI1F3LwO pic.twitter.com/jcD1aBdUiO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: "他说的都是真心话。"哈里斯副总统首次对拜登总统的热麦评论做出回应，他在评论中表示，他和以色列总理内塔尼亚胡将很快就加沙战争进行一次 "来见耶稣 "的对话。
item.description:
"He meant what he said."

Vice Pres. Harris reacted for the first time to Pres. Biden's hot mic comment in which he's heard saying he and Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu will soon have a "come to Jesus" conversation about the war in Gaza. https://t.co/LeUyCRVIhF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 去年秋天，V-22 "鱼鹰 "飞机在日本发生致命坠机事故，造成八名军人丧生，美国军方已解除对该飞机的禁飞令，为这种倾斜旋翼机三个月来的首次复飞铺平了道路。
item.description:
The U.S. military has lifted its flight ban on V-22 Osprey aircraft after a deadly crash in Japan killed eight service members last fall, paving the way for the tilt rotorcraft to fly again for the first time in three months. https://t.co/4ZruPiTChQ pic.twitter.com/8Qcimxf1sL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 就在拜登总统发表国情咨文演讲之前，奥巴马总统的前演讲稿撰写人特里-苏普拉特接受了 @ABC 新闻的采访，讨论了他作为奥巴马白宫的一员帮助撰写演讲稿的经历。
item.description:
Terry Szuplat, a former speechwriter for Pres. Obama, spoke with @ABC News just before Pres. Biden's State of the Union address to discuss his experiences helping craft the speech as part of the Obama White House. https://t.co/NEDnq9qNLl

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

University of Florida students protested outside of the Board of Trustees meeting Friday over the university's decision to eliminate all of its DEI positions. https://t.co/SMRCgrTCqW

item.title: 周五公布的一项调查显示，由于价格飞涨，三分之一的意大利人减少了特级初榨橄榄油的消费，而特级初榨橄榄油是地中海饮食的主要成分。
item.description:
One-third of Italians have reduced their consumption of extra virgin olive oil, a mainstay of the Mediterranean diet, due to skyrocketing prices, according to a survey released Friday. https://t.co/8mKrhOaLcv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 微软公司周五宣布，一个由俄罗斯国家支持的组织入侵了微软公司的电子邮件账户，并获得了微软核心软件系统的访问权限。
item.description:
A Russian state-backed group that Microsoft said hacked into its corporate email accounts was able to gain access to its core software systems, the company announced on Friday. https://t.co/d6ZqGCSBaP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统对以色列总理内塔尼亚胡的不满情绪与日俱增，在周四晚的国情咨文演讲结束后，拜登总统在麦克风上被热议。
item.description:
Pres. Biden's growing frustration with Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu was caught on a hot mic following Thursday night's State of the Union address. https://t.co/jsJoBPglH6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 新消息：美国经济上个月新增就业岗位27.5万个，超过经济学家预期的约20万个。但数据显示，这与1月份大约35万的新增就业人数相比仍有大幅下降：
item.description:
NEW: The U.S. economy added 275,000 jobs last month, blowing past economist expectations of about 200,000 jobs. Still, it was a substantial decline from the hiring of roughly 350,000 workers in January, data showed.

More here: https://t.co/0uTIYKKghs pic.twitter.com/2Q4E67jVZp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024
